data.title: Chapter :- 3 GIMP Introduction
data.text:
1. GIMP is developed under _______ on UNIX platform .

(a) Microsoft

(b) X11

(c) Adobe

2. Digital images in GIMP are made up of tiny , solid color squares called _______

(a) Dots

(b) Effect

(c) Pixels

3. ________ displays the options relevant to the selected tool.

(a) Menu Bar

(b) Tool Option

(c) Panel

4. ________ tool can be used to copy information from one area of an image to another.

(a) Selection

(b) Eraser

(c) Clone

5. ________ tool is also used to create curved or jagged selection.

(a) Free Select

(b) Fuzzy Select

(c) Scissors Select

6. ______ tool can be used to select a color from an open image.

(a) Clone

(b) Color Picker

(c) Crop

7. _______ filter is used to add or remove graininess to/from your image.

(a) Noise

(b) Distort

(c) Balance

Q.1 What is the fuction of GIMP toolbar?

Ans :- The Toolbox contains many tools , Most tools have option which means that you can use them to perform some specific task.

Q.2 Name the different way to change size of an image.

Ans :- There are three ways to change size of an image

(1) On Screen Size

(2) The print size

(3) The canvas size

Q.3 What is the use of scissors select tool?

Ans :- This tool is used to select elements of image that have well-defined edges.

Q.1 What is GIMP? Write down its features.

Ans :- GIMP is a open source program that allow you to create modify combine digital images . Feature are :-

1.Painting Image

2.Adjusting Color

3.Applying effects

4.Applying filters

5.Adding texts

Q.2 What are color modes? Write the use of different color modes.

Ans :- You can use color needs to apply the spcific colors in your image, such as

(1) RGB :- It is the common mode for working with images.

(2) GrayScale :- You can remove color from your image.

Q.3 What do you mean by adjusting brightness and contrast of an image?

Ans :- You can brighten darken and change the shades of colors in different parts of your image with GIMP Dodge,Burn and simailar tools.

Q.4 What are filters? Why do we use RGB Noise filter?

Ans :- You can quickly and easily apply enchancement and correct detect your image with filters . RGB Noises filter add or remove a texture resembling that of sand in your image.
